mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMTYPE !=8 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
select * from (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMTYPE !=8 order by ITEMLIST_NO desc) where rownum <= #{endRow} and rownum >= #{startRow} order by ITEMLIST_NO desc

select * from (select ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMTYPE !=8 and ITEMNAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by ITEMLIST_NO desc) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow}

select * from (select ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMNAME like and ITEMTYPE !=8 and '%'||#{search}||'%' order by ITEMSELLCOUNT desc) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow}
select count(*) from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMTYPE !=8
select count(*) from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMNAME like '%' ||#{search}|| '%' and ITEMTYPE !=8
select * from (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMTYPE !=8 order by ITEMSELLCOUNT desc) where rownum <= 4
select i.ITEMLIST_NO from ITEMLIST i , MY_ITEM m where i.ITEMLIST_NO=m.ITEMLIST_NO and m.MYITEM_NO=#{useritempk}

select count(it.ITEMNAME) from my_item mi,item_log il,itemlist it,using_item ui where mi.ITEMLIST_NO = it.ITEMLIST_NO and mi.MYITEM_NO = ui.MYITEM_NO and ui.USING_ITEM_NO = il.USING_ITEM_NO and mi.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}

select * from ( select rownum rnum,it.ITEMNAME,mi.BUY_DATE,ui.START_DATE,ui.END_DATE,il.FINAL_STATUS from my_item mi,item_log il,itemlist it,using_item ui where mi.ITEMLIST_NO = it.ITEMLIST_NO and mi.MYITEM_NO = ui.MYITEM_NO and ui.USING_ITEM_NO = il.USING_ITEM_NO and mi.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} and it.itemtype != 2) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select * from (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMTYPE != 8 order by ITEMLIST_NO desc ) where rownum <= 1
select * from (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' order by ITEMSELLCOUNT desc) where rownum <= 1
select * from ITEMLIST where ITEMTYPE=8 and ITEMPRICE = (select max(ITEMPRICE) from ITEMLIST where ITEMTYPE=8)
select * from ITEMLIST where ITEMTYPE=8 order by ITEMPRICE desc
